* Sets up the required objects, loads the data from the storage file, and displays the welcome message.
* Reads the user command, executes it and displays the result until exit signal.

* No deletion occurs if the index is non-positive or greater than
: "Invalid take number! Must be between 1 and " + taskList.size();
return new CommandResult("Noted. I've deleted this task:\n  " + taskList.delete(taskNo));
/** The index of the task to mark as done, 1-based not zero-based. */

* Marks the task as done if the index is not out of bounds and
* the task is not done already. No changes occur if the index is
* non-positive or greater than the task list size, or if the
: "Invalid take number! Must be between 1 and " + taskList.size();
? new CommandResult("I've marked this task as done:\n  " + taskList.get(taskNo))

return new InvalidCommand("I cannot understand the date :( "
+ "Please format it as DD-MM-YYYY hhmm[ to DD-MM-YYY hhmm] (Time in 24hr format)");
* Parses tokens in the context of a find command.

assertEquals("[D][ ] JUnit test iP (by: 26 Aug 2021 10.30pm)", dl.toString());

assertEquals("[E][X] JUnit test iP (from: 26 Aug 2021 10.30pm — 27 Aug 2021 3.00am)", e.toString());
